meta.name: description
meta.content: Pltfrm wants to create a new way to work with and for the independent workforce. Built for nomadic mobility with career stability, we believe it should be effortless for freelancers and clients to work together.

meta.name: keywords
meta.content: platform, pltfrm, remote, freelance, remote working, nomad, digital, digital nomad, independent workforce, nomadic mobility, career stability, work together
